meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics used to treat tuberculosis and other bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed rifampins to cure the bacterial infection in my lungs.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stored a large supply of rifampins to combat tuberculosis outbreaks.
meanings.sent3: The rifampins marched into the body like tiny soldiers ready to fight off the invading bacteria.
meanings.sent4: Her bloodstream turned into a battlefield where rifampins waged war against the tuberculosis bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The rifampins acted like superheroes, swooping in to save the day by defeating the bacterial villains.
